name: Gute Zeiten - Schlechte Zeiten: Volume 3
description:
This game is a licensed adventure based on the German soap opera Gute Zeiten - Schlechte Zeiten. The player has to solve ten problems of the series' characters, e.g. the love story between Marie Balzer und Kai Scholl. He does that collecting items and using it with the correct character. There are also many conversations. In addition the player has to travel to certain locations of the series which are shown in full motion video - including the actors. The puzzles are designed for beginners.

The second part of the CD-ROM is a database which includes a timeline and bios of the characters. The GZSZ horoscope gives information about the star signs of the actors and how they correspond to the buyers'.

shot.caption: Title screen. So far, so bad.
Biography mode. Here you can view all the actors / actresses and their respective characters biographies.
Horoscope mode. Here you can let the game generate your own unique horoscope. Also, you can see and compare the other characters horoscopes as well.
The FMV intro to episode 1. Trouble is brewing in the sushi bar!
A text panel explains the goal in each episode: This time you take on the role of Daniel, whose task is to save the sushi bar, run down by his business partner Fabian.
Conversations consist of simple multiple choice answers. Most of the time, there are obvious troll answers mixed in, which usually result in an instant Game Over.
I got a Game Over because I decided to close down the sushi bar and emigrate to Australia to become a sheep farmer. No joke.
Another obvious troll answer: You can tell Elisabeth that "Fugu" is actually a Japanese martial art, combining the art of cooking with the art of fighting...
And another obvious troll answer: You can confess to Elisabeth that you actually stole a comfy Japanese pillow (!) from the cook at the bar to ease your neck pain (it's all so random)...
After giving the correct answers, Elisabeth joins Daniels "party" and the sushi bar opens up as a new location.
